name: Fleeting Memories Last A Snowflake - Beta
name_original: Fleeting Memories Last A Snowflake - Beta
description:
The story revolves around the protagonist Airi moving to a smaller city to pursue her education and a peaceful boy named Kaiya, whom she encountered in the photography club. 

A studious boy who loves to read above all else, and an intrusive girl who can't help but poke her nose into everyone's affairs.

- Credits -

  • Daniel Bauzon - Kaiya
  • Lily Yasuda - Sora
  • Xander M. Grant - Chiba
  • Hannah Beard - Hana
  • Extras - Anthony B Perez & Lauren Kong & Zoe Sanders
